attributes.action: Urgently legislate for complete transparency in UK consumer gas and electricity prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Crude oil prices have reduced significantly from their peak earler this year and petroleum retailers have responded to government pressure to reduce prices.

Gas and Electricity utility companies significantly increased prices as soon as Oil prices rose to their peaks but appear to be prevaricating and dodging criticism that they should reduce prices significantly.

This is an ongoing issue and a fairer totally transparent structure is required to deal with present and future pricing for the consumer.
